trans-unit.source: Defines the abstract methods required to implement a plug-in document serialization <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> collator.
trans-unit.target: Definisce i metodi astratti necessari per implementare un fascicolatore plug-in di elementi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> per la serializzazione di documenti.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> is created with the <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator" /> method of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> viene creato con il <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator" /> metodo la <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> writes to the same output stream as is written to by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> that created the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" />.
trans-unit.target: Il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> scrive nel flusso di output stesso così come viene scritta dal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> che ha creato il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> is created with the <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator" /> method of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> viene creato con il <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator" /> metodo la <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> writes to the same output stream as is written to by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> that created the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" />.
trans-unit.target: Il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> scrive nel flusso di output stesso così come viene scritta dal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> che ha creato il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, initiates the start of a batch write operation.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene eseguito l'override in una classe derivata, avvia l'inizio di un'operazione di scrittura batch.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, cancels a synchronous <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.Write" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: In caso di override in una classe derivata, annulla un'operazione <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.Write" /> sincrona.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, cancels an asynchronous <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: In caso di override in una classe derivata, annulla un'operazione <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync" /> asincrona.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes a batch write operation.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene eseguito l'override in una classe derivata, completa un'operazione di scrittura batch.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, synchronously writes a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> element to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: In caso di override in una classe derivata, scrive in modo sincrono un determinato elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> nel flusso di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.Write%2A> methods write to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.Write%2A> metodi scrivono nel flusso associato i <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> che ha creato il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> dalla chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The visual element to write to the serialization <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: Elemento visivo da scrivere nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, synchronously writes a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> element to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: In caso di override in una classe derivata, scrive in modo sincrono un determinato elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> nel flusso di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.Write%2A> method writes to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.Write%2A> metodo scrive nel flusso associato i <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> che ha creato il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> dalla chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> that is written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> che viene scritto nel flusso.

trans-unit.source: An object specifying preferences for how the material should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che specifica le preferenze relative alla modalità di stampa del materiale.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, synchronously writes a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> element together with an associated print ticket to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: In caso di override in una classe derivata, scrive in modo sincrono un determinato elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> insieme a un print ticket associato nel flusso di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.Write%2A> method writes to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.Write%2A> metodo scrive nel flusso associato i <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> che ha creato il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> dalla chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, asynchronously writes a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> element to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: In caso di override in una classe derivata, scrive in modo asincrono un determinato elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> nel flusso di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> methods write to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> metodi scrivono nel flusso associato i <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> che ha creato il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> dalla chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The visual element to write to the serialization <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: Elemento visivo da scrivere nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, asynchronously writes a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> element to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: In caso di override in una classe derivata, scrive in modo asincrono un determinato elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> nel flusso di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> methods write to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> metodi scrivono nel flusso associato i <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> che ha creato il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> dalla chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The visual element to write to the serialization <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: Elemento visivo da scrivere nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: A caller-specified object to identify the asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto specificato dal chiamante per identificare l'operazione di scrittura asincrona.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, asynchronously writes a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> element with a specified event identifier to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: In caso di override in una classe derivata, scrive in modo asincrono un determinato elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> con un identificatore di evento specificato nel flusso di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> methods write to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> metodi scrivono nel flusso associato i <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> che ha creato il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> dalla chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `userState` is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingCompletedEventHandler> when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingCompleted> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: `userState` viene passato per il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingCompletedEventHandler> quando il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingCompleted> si verifica l'evento.

trans-unit.source: The visual element to write to the serialization <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: Elemento visivo da scrivere nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The default print preferences for the <c>visual</c> element.
trans-unit.target: Preferenze di stampa predefinite per l'elemento <c>visual</c>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, asynchronously writes a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> element together with an associated print ticket to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: In caso di override in una classe derivata, scrive in modo asincrono un determinato elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> insieme a un print ticket associato nel flusso di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> method writes to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> metodo scrive nel flusso associato i <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> che ha creato il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> dalla chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `printTicket` can be `null` if there are no preferred print settings.
trans-unit.target: `printTicket` può essere `null` se non sono presenti impostazioni di stampate preferite.

trans-unit.source: The visual element to write to the serialization <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: Elemento visivo da scrivere nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The default print preferences for the <c>visual</c> element.
trans-unit.target: Preferenze di stampa predefinite per l'elemento <c>visual</c>.

trans-unit.source: A caller-specified object to identify the asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto specificato dal chiamante per identificare l'operazione di scrittura asincrona.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, asynchronously writes a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> element together with an associated print ticket and identifier to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: In caso di override in una classe derivata, scrive in modo asincrono un determinato elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> insieme a un print ticket e a un identificatore associati nel flusso di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> method writes to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> metodo scrive nel flusso associato i <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> che ha creato il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> dalla chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `printTicket` can be `null` if there are no preferred print settings.
trans-unit.target: `printTicket` può essere `null` se non sono presenti impostazioni di stampate preferite.

trans-unit.source: `userState` is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingCompletedEventHandler> when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingCompleted> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: `userState` viene passato per il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingCompletedEventHandler> quando il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingCompleted> si verifica l'evento.
